评论概述: Absolutely recommend buying BUT just be warned…
类型: Fit Type: 31" InseamSize: X-SmallColor: Dark Sage
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE these pants and already have bought them in two different colors because I liked them so much!!! The fit is super flattering and comfortable, especially as a girl of 5’8 who struggles to find pants that are actually long enough (I’m normally size S but ordered XS w/31” inseam). That being said, I still feel like it’s important to note a few things.  As some other reviews mention, the material is incredibly soft and nicely weighted, but unfortunately it also stains/shows stains VERY easily. The colors I purchased (sage green & nutria) are kind of lighter and faded looking to begin with, which I like, but maybe that contributes to the heavy showing of stains? Either way it’s definitely an annoying part of these pants because I’m always slightly worried about ruining them. The other thing I don’t love is that even though the material feels luxurious and high-end, it’s doesn’t seem super durable as it’s prone to snagging.  Overall, despite some annoying issues, I would still highly recommend because they are cute, versatile, fit nicely, and I like the feel of them.

评论概述: Amazing fabric but not a good fit for an apple body type
评论详情: The fabric on these is really amazing. I would love to find a pair of pants in this fabric that actually fit me.  The inseam was 27" which is what I ordered, so that wasn't the issue. They just didn't work at all with my body type. I carry my weight around the middle and am slimmer through the hips and thighs, and currently have a bit of extra belly weight. Unfortunately the extra fabric around my hips bunched up and looked like a pouch. Had to return them, sadly.  Also, when this says wide legs the bottom of the leg is much wider than it appears in the photo, which is not a good look for a petite. But the fabric, it's sooo velvety and soft and amazing. I was obsessively searching every pant style this company offers in hopes of finding a pair that would work for me. : ( The lady at the UPS store event commented on the softness of the fabric when I returned them.

评论详情: I recently purchased a pair of soft wide leg pants, and I must say, they have quickly become a staple in my wardrobe! From the moment I slipped them on, I was impressed by how incredibly comfortable they are. The fabric is luxuriously soft against the skin, making them perfect for all-day wear whether I'm lounging at home, running errands, or heading out for a casual dinner.  One of the standout features of these pants is their wrinkle-resistant quality. I often find myself in situations where I need to pack light or travel, and these pants have proven to be a game-changer. Even after being folded in my suitcase, they come out looking fresh and ready to wear—no ironing required! This is a huge plus for anyone who wants to maintain a polished look without the hassle of constant upkeep.  The fit is another highlight. The wide leg design is not only stylish but also flattering, providing a relaxed silhouette that accommodates all body types.
I wanted to love these but the waist was so tight and has no give. Had to return.

I am a corporate girl and as I transitioned into growing during my pregnancy I needed a pant to swap in my closet for my traditional slacks. The material is quality and has a distinct rich look that is flattering. I could wear these pants all day because of how comfortable they are and stretch and fit great! I would not have made it through my pregnancy and needing to dress for an in office job without these pants.

评论概述: I wanted to love these, but the waist is so tiny.
评论详情: My main problem with these pants is the waistband. It is so so  tiny and uncomfortable. If you have a small waist and an hourglass figure it won’t be a problem.  I am 5’1” and 121 lbs.  I purchased a 27” small and it fit perfectly everywhere else.  My other problem was with the color.  The black looked faded although they weren’t.  It was just the color of the material.  You wouldn’t be able to wear it with something black. It’s noticeable (shown in the last photo).The thing that I did like about these pants was the material.  So soft and comfortable. They draped well and just overall very flattering.  If the waist had actually fit me, I would’ve return the black pair for a different color.

评论概述: Perfect pants ruined by too-tight elastic waistband
评论详情: I’m so sad to be returning these pants— the weight and texture of the fabric is lovely, and the fit of the pants themselves is quite nice, drapey and wide legged without being too much, including giving enough fabric for wider thighs.  However, the elastic waistband needed just a little more, maybe an inch, to not pinch and be uncomfortable. Ordered the XL (Amazon said L would fit me best 😆).

评论详情: Positives, soft, comfortable. Negatives these pants show everything, spots, anything I touch by walking by or carrying.
The fabric and the fit are weird. Very baggy, not my thing.

Wanted to love these pants but returned because of color and tight waist  PROS Material: Fabric is supple and flows beautifully. Rich and opaque, but not bulky. Almost velvety and is somewhat textured depending on direction of nap. Style: Wide legs are chic. Pleated front provides a classy and classic look. Size: Purchased XL, which is mostly true to size. Seat not too tight or baggy. Seat and legs lay nicely. No bulging or riding up. Buyer is 5.5 1/2, and 29" inseam hits slightly below ankle. Inseam length works well with shoes that are 2 inch or less  CONS Material: Legs are flowy. However, waist is made from a different type of material than the legs and has no give. Color: The navy is more like a dusty slate. It DID NOT appear as a deep, nautical navy as it looked on a few computers I viewed it on. Size: Purchased XL. Waist is a little smaller than other XL-sized pants that I've purchased from Asian companies on Amazon or in large U.S. department stores. Tight waist sizing is attributable to the inflexibility of the material at the waist.

A a comfortable and versatile addition to any wardrobe. The modal fabric is soft and lightweight, making them perfect for lounging or casual outings. Yesterday evening I wore my new pants while unpacking at my new house and the pants were fabulous!  Soft, warm and very flexible. Perfect for the task.Since I only wore them a few hours, I decided to wear them this morning and I noticed that the front edge of the cuff has a dozen or so small pulls.  They are definitely pulls in the knit fabric and not pills that could easily be trimmed off.Note to self: do not wear these pants with sparkly, glittery Crocs.  I’m sure the pants were getting picked and abraded by the rough surface of the shoes.  It’s totally my fault, not the manufacturer.  Any other knit pant would do this.  I only mention it in my review so that others do not make the same mistake.I love the pants and plan on buying more!  (I’ll just keep this pair for wearing around the house)

Loved the slate green color, the material, and the overall high waist, wide leg fit. The rise could have been shorter, but if you wear them high enough, it works.
